title: [Neuroscience] A single head injury could lead to dementia later in life. Compared to participants who never experienced a head injury, a single prior head injury was associated with a 1.25 times increased risk, a history of two or more prior head injuries was associated with over 2 times increased risk
[Health] Vitamin D Supplements at Preclinical Stage Prevented MS in Mice. Yet another reason to take Vitamin D supplements.
